Guidance is strongly needed on how to manage children with allergic diseases during the pandemic, particularly, as the pandemic is hitting the Northern Hemisphere during the tree and grass pollen pollination season. How to run a clinic under the condition of the COVID‐19 pandemic is reviewed in the EAACI position paper.
21 Although the current COVID‐19 pandemic may fade away and hopefully eventually a vaccine may be available, it is unavoidable that new respiratory viruses will appear and that similar questions will arise again in the future. Hopefully, these recommendations will be helpful also in future similar events.
